dialogue.introduction: Yes ye~s! I'm the Shiratsuyu-class destroyer 'Murasame'! Everyone, nice to meet you!
dialogue.library_intro: 3rd of the Shiratsuyu-class destroyers, Murasame! Aren't all the Rainy destroyers stylish? With my sister ship Yuudachi, we formed the 2nd DesDiv. 'Rat Transport?' Well, excuse me, I did great at the Guadalcanal transport runs, you know!
dialogue.secretary3: Eh, whatwhat? Do you want to consult with me?
dialogue.secretaryidle: I see... you are leaving me aside... I don't have that kind of interest, so I'm upset!
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral, when you're feeling down, Murasame will give you some of her spirit! There! Well? Feeling better?
dialogue.wedding: Just the two of us, it's suprisingly fun, I think. Hey, the compatbility between us is good, yeah?
dialogue.equipment1: Yeah! Good, great! Expect great things from Murasame next week too!
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Hah~ Gotta take a break, yeah~?
dialogue.start_a_sortie: I'll show some a little of Murasame's goodness!
dialogue.night_battle: Oh my, you're still going? Th~at's ok~ay!
dialogue.night_attack: I've got both cannons and torpedos!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: I've got both cannons and torpedos!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: I've got both cannons and torpedos!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: I've got both cannons and torpedos!
dialogue.mvp: It's great that the fleet had a victory. You shouldn't make light of the Shiratsuyu-class' power, you know?
dialogue.moderately_damaged: I'm truely a bit put out... geez...
dialogue.sunk: I did the best I could... that's great... farewell...
dialogue.new_year_2015: Admiral, Happy New Year! I'll show you a few of Murasame's good points this year too!
dialogue.valentines_day_2015: Would you like to try some of these nice chocolates? They're sweet and just a little bitter. Ufufu♪
dialogue.white_day_2015: Hmm.... A return gift for Valentine's? It's going great. Murasame has been expecting this.
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Yes yes. Today is an important day. Admiral, do you remember? Really? That's good.
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: Ah, Harusame? Nope. Admiral? Looking for someone? Hmm, that's not it? What is it? If you're fine, Murasame is willing to listen! Now, go on.
dialogue.early_summer_2015: They got me... and just when I got to put on this swimsuit too... Well, it's alright. I'm going to take a bath.
dialogue.midsummer_2015: Yes, yes! Summer it is, summer! Admiral, shall we go together to the sea? Not as a sortie!
dialogue.fall_2015: Humhum♪ I don't dislike autumn for what it is. I wonder how Harusame is feeling?
dialogue.fall_event_2015: Transport operation... Gotta be careful at night in the sea. We should proceed with caution.
dialogue.christmas_2015: Admiral, you want to see a little bit what's inside in Murasame's present? Not yet, it's a secret.
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Yeah, yeah. It's the end of year cleaning. The Admiral too, should also clean up with a broom and dustpan!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Yep, yep! It's Setsubun, isn't it? I wonder, since when did this event start being celebrated? Don't you?
